concept.title: Field Hasher
concept.shortdesc: The Field Hasher uses an algorithm to encode values in a field. The Field Hasher can use MD5, SHA1 or SHA2 to hash field values.

conbody.p: Field Hasher processoroverviewprocessorsField HasherUse the Field Hasher to encode highly-sensitive data. For example, you might use the Field Hasher to encode social security or credit card numbers.
